dict.acceptation: 媒体；[解剖学]血管中层；[语音学] 浊塞音；介质；[医]培养基；

sent.orig: Nevertheless, MEDIA-TECH members are already engaged in developing the necessary manufacturing equipment for this coming generation.
sent.trans: 然而，MEDIA-TECH的成员已经开始为即将到来的格式所需要的生产制作设备开始忙碌。

sent.orig: The device name in the device.INF or media.INI file is too long.
sent.trans: 在device.inf或media.ini文件中的设备名称太长。

sent.orig: Media-related courses include fundamentals of media technologies, media theory, media law, and contemporary media issues.
sent.trans: 传播相关课程则包括：传播科技概论、播理论、播法规、代传播问题等。

sent.orig: FAIR's Media Activism Resources-Multitude of media activist resources from newsletter to media activism kit.
sent.trans: 公正的媒体活跃的资源--众多媒体活动家资源，从新闻媒体到运动包。

sent.orig: Third, the traditional media and new media integration is the trend, multi-media time has arrived.
sent.trans: 第三，传统媒体和新媒体的融合是大势所趋，跨媒体时代已经到来。
